name: SeriousSport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to be able to engage more with your friends and family about whats happening in the sporting world? Does your partner love to go on about sports and you feel like you have nothing to say?

Enable this skill now so that you can stay up-to-date about everything happening in the sporting world and impress your friends, family and even co-workers with your impressive knowledge of sport.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
